organizations.name: Industrial Data Space
organizations.description:
For companies, data is only worthwhile if it can be processed. At the same time, a new, comprehensive and generally accepted handling practice has to be anchored in the way data is utilised.

Industrial Data Space is a virtual data space which supports the secure exchange and simple linking of data in business ecosystems on the basis of standards and by using collaborative governance models.

Data is only exchanged if it is requested from trustworthy certified partners. The data owner â€“ i.e. the company â€“ determines who is allowed to use the data in what way. As a result, the partners of one supply chain have joint access to certain data by mutual consent so that they can start something new, develop new business models, design their own processes more efficiently or initiate additional added value processes elsewhere, either alone or together.
organizations.short_description: Industrial Data Space is a peer-to-peer network, a virtual data space that supports the secure exchange and the simple linking of data.

organizations.name: Invisible Homes
organizations.description:
Invisible Homes is an alternative to the status quo, which asks sellers to publicly list their properties so that buyers can find them. Instead, we ask buyers to list their searches, and sellers who are not on the public market find them

We are aimed at the mass market, although uptake is likely to be faster at the higher level to start with. Agents and individuals will be able to use the site.
organizations.short_description: Off market selling platform for residential market

organizations.name: Creaholic
organizations.description:
Creaholic provides concept generation, technology and engineering, business and management, design development, and IP creation services.

Their core mission is to be professional inventors for international clients. To accomplish that, they need a flexible, capable, multidisciplinary team: unique experts who can also work with others. Theyâ€™re proud that the team theyâ€™ve assembled has the skills and experience to support their enormous range of projects. 

For over 30 years, their approach to invention has been guided by a unique philosophy. They think of the journey from idea to business in terms of the three phases of matter: gas, liquid, solid.

investors.name: R/GA Ventures
investors.description:
At R/GA Ventures, we go beyond financial capital to connect early- and growth-stage startups with our world-class creative talent, industry-leading clients and innovative program partners.  
 
Our flexible financing terms support companies at all stages of funding and growth. We invest  in each of our program companies at current valuations.

We match each of our startups with the right experts across our global network, providing consulting, strategy, design, copywriting, business development, brand transformation and more.

We make introductions that create value not only for our startups, but for our partners and clientsâ€”fostering an innovation exchange that makes way for pilots, partnerships and integrations.

organizations.name: ASPIRE JS
organizations.description:
ASPIRE looks beyond traditional methods of recruitment, CV and job spec matching. We analyse billions of gigabytes of publicly available data combined with personal information shared by candidates, to match the right company with the right talent. 

With ASPIRE we introduce unparalleled level of machine learning to develop a matching algorithm that will change the way the recruitment process works. We are taking scientific approach already applied (to extent) in dating industry into recruitment market.
organizations.short_description: Match.com for recruitment
